short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best weather new tab extention

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the browsing experience with the Weather New Tab, this feature enables your Chrome search page into a new interface with changing background images and provides updates on the Weather and Time. "By clicking “Add to Chrome”, You accept and agree to installing the Weather New Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. New Tab Search will be provided by Microsoft Bing"
